statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE country = 'Canada' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA' AND state = 'California';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, city, state, country FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND state = 'California' ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE country = 'Canada' UNION SELECT first_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE country = 'Mexico';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT customers.first_name, campaigns.campaign_name FROM customers INNER JOIN campaigns ON customers.customer_id = campaigns.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE country = 'France';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, target_audience FROM campaigns WHERE start_date = '2022-10-01';
SELECT customer_name, message_text, send_date FROM customers c JOIN messages m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id WHERE m.campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT message_text, send_date FROM messages WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY send_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(message_id) AS message_count FROM messages GROUP BY customer_id HAVING message_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2023-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, opened, clicked FROM campaign_history WHERE segment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name='Smith';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, ch.sent_date, ch.opened FROM customers c JOIN campaign_history ch ON c.customer_id = ch.customer_id WHERE ch.opened = true;

SELECT cs.segment_name, COUNT(ch.customer_id) as total_customers FROM customer_segments cs LEFT JOIN campaign_history ch ON cs.segment_id = ch.segment_id GROUP BY cs.segment_name ORDER BY total_customers DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT message_text, send_date FROM messages ORDER BY send_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(message_id) AS total_messages FROM message_recipients GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_messages > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT message_text, send_date, recipients.first_name, recipients.last_name FROM messages JOIN customers AS recipients ON messages.recipient_id = recipients.customer_id;

SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, COUNT(analytics_id) AS total_actions FROM customers JOIN analytics ON customers.customer_id = analytics.recipient_id GROUP BY customers.first_name, customers.last_name ORDER BY total_actions DESC;
